```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(shinydashboard)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r reading,echo=FALSE}
df = read.csv("/home/madhura/Madhura/JD_Leetcode/problem_list.csv")
df$Problem = paste(df$LeetCode_no,df$Problem,sep = '-')
df$LeetCode_no = NULL

```

```{r shiny,echo=FALSE}
ui <- dashboardPage(
  dashboardHeader("hello"),
  dashboardSidebar(selectizeInput(inputId = 'diff', label = 'difficulty_level',choices =  c("easy","medium","hard"),multiple = TRUE)),
  dashboardBody(dataTableOutput('tbl'))
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  df1 = df
  df1$Link = sapply(df1$Link, function(x) toString(tags$a(href=paste0( x), x)))
  output$tbl = renderDataTable(expr = datatable(df1, escape=FALSE),options = list(autoWidth = T))
}

shinyApp(ui, server)

```
